attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Appoint an independant group of non politicians to review the laws enacted by the government over the last 10 years relating to curtailment of civil liberties.
CCTV, Speed Cameras, Proposed I.D Cards, monitoring of emails, ISP data, ASBOs (Making non criminal activity a crime), detention without charge, even the loss of the right to remain silent.

If the said group should believe the law is draconian and unnessesary, it will then be repealed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
